definition: to fire/to sack/to dismiss/to terminate employment
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Now Russia, for at least the second time, has fired on a Chinese civilian ship.
sentences.chinese: 現在俄羅斯，至少第二次，解僱了在中國民用船。

sentences.english: The Justice Department says those dismissals were based on poor performance.
sentences.chinese: 司法部稱解僱是由於他們不良的工作表現。

sentences.english: Then they fire them without a second thought.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們會不加考慮，就把他解僱。

sentences.english: He got the sack for petty thieving.
sentences.chinese: 他因小偷小摸遭到了解僱。

sentences.english: Last week she ordered a halt to all dismissals of gay service members.
sentences.chinese: 上週，該法官下令暫停解僱所有同性戀服役人員。

sentences.english: The servant accepted his dismissal without any complaint.
sentences.chinese: 那僕人毫無怨言地接受解僱。

sentences.english: About 40,000 workers are now likely to be made redundant by year-end.
sentences.chinese: 大約有40000工人很有可能在今年底就被解僱。

sentences.english: As I'm fired, I hope I can get a good recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我被解僱，但我希望能得到一份不錯的推薦書。

sentences.english: It’s much easier to take this step during the probationary period than it is later on.
sentences.chinese: 在試用期做出解僱的決定要比以後做出決定容易得多。

sentences.english: Opposition leaders called for ­Nakagawa's immediate dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 反對黨領袖要求立刻解僱中川。

sentences.english: Is a worker terminated or disciplined who is not willing to work in overtimes ?
sentences.chinese: 不願加班的工人是否會被解僱或紀律處罰？

sentences.english: Be slow to hire and quick to fire.
sentences.chinese: 招人要慎重，解僱要快速。

sentences.english: They couldn't sack me - I'd done nothing wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他們不能解僱我，我沒有做錯任何事情。

sentences.english: Dismissals and suspensions have often taken place on the flimsiest of evidence.
sentences.chinese: 經常發生解僱和停職但是往往有缺乏證據。

sentences.english: It’s illegal for anyone to be fired because of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 任何人因爲懷孕被公司解僱都是違法的。

sentences.english: A:If I were you I would tell the truth, or you'll be dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是你，我就講真話，不然你將被解僱。

definition: to be transferred to another post/to post away

to ask sb to resign from a post
